# TheGrantScout

> Last updated: 2026-01-20 | Version: 1.0

> AI-powered grant matching service that helps nonprofits find foundations already funding work like theirs. We analyze 8.3M+ grants from IRS 990-PF filings to match organizations with relevant funders.

TheGrantScout is a subscription service ($83-99/month) that delivers monthly reports containing:
- Curated foundation opportunities matched to your mission
- Funder profiles with giving history and typical grant ranges
- Positioning strategies based on funding patterns
- Contact information and application details

## Quick Facts

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Foundations | 143,000+ |
| Historical Grants | 8.3M+ |
| Data Years | 2016-2024 |
| Data Source | IRS Form 990-PF |
| Update Frequency | Annual |
| Starting Price | $83/month |

## How It Works

1. Client provides mission, programs, geography, and funding goals
2. AI analyzes grant history from IRS filings
3. Algorithm matches client with foundations funding similar work
4. Monthly report delivered with opportunities and funder intelligence

## Pricing

- Monthly: $99/month (cancel anytime)
- Annual: $999/year ($83/month equivalent)
- Founding member rates locked in

## Comparison to Alternatives

| Alternative | TheGrantScout Difference |
|-------------|--------------------------|
| Grant databases (Candid, Foundation Directory) | We do the research FOR youâ€”curated matches, not just data access |
| Grant writing services | We find funders; they write proposals. We focus on the research phase |
| DIY 990-PF research | We analyze 8.3M grants instantly vs. manual search through individual filings |

## Example Use Cases

- Small nonprofit ($500K budget) in California seeking foundation grants for senior services
- National organization looking for foundations funding healthcare education
- Regional youth athletics program seeking local/regional funders
- Environmental nonprofit expanding from 1 state to multi-state reach

## About

- Founded: 2024 by Alec Kleinman
- Data Source: IRS Form 990-PF (official government filings)
- Coverage: All US private foundations required to file
- Update Frequency: Annual (as IRS releases data)

- Email: hello@thegrantscout.com
